price: Ababangikanyamana basenga mu gishingo c’Imana Allah ibigirwamana ata na kimwe bishoboye, ntibishoboye kubaronsa ivyobabeshaho biturutse kw’igwa ry’imvura ivuye mu bicu izananye mu kirere, canke bivuye mu mwimbu w’ivyarimwe kw’isi. Eka nta na kimwe bishoboye, vyongeye ntibinakwiye kuba hari n’ico vyoshobora.
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ رِزۡقٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lahum riz'qan mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi shayan walā yastaṭīʿūna
